verses.arabic_tajweed_html: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ ١
verses.bangla: Exalted is He who holds all control in His hands; who has power over all things;

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٲةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلاً‌ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٢
verses.bangla: who created death and life to test you [people] and reveal which of you does best––He is the Mighty, the Forgiving;

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٲتٍ طِبَاقًا‌ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ‌ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ ٣
verses.bangla: who created the seven heavens, one above the other. You will not see any flaw in what the Lord of Mercy creates. Look again! Can you see any flaw?

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ ٤
verses.bangla: Look again! And again! Your sight will turn back to you, weak and defeated.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ‌ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ ٥
verses.bangla: We have adorned the lowest heaven with lamps and made them [missiles] for stoning devils for whom We have also prepared the torment of a blazing fire.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ‌ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ ٦
verses.bangla: For those who defy their Lord We have prepared the torment of Hell: an evil destination.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: إِذَآ أُلْقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ ٧
verses.bangla: They will hear it drawing in its breath when they are thrown in. It blazes forth,

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ‌ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ ٨
verses.bangla: almost bursting with rage. Its keepers will ask every group that is thrown in, ‘Did no one come to warn you?’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ ٩
verses.bangla: They will reply, ‘Yes, a warner did come to us, but we did not believe him. We said, “God has revealed nothing: you are greatly misguided”.’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: وَقَالُواْ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ ١٠
verses.bangla: They will say, ‘If only we had listened, or reasoned, we would not be with the inhabitants of the blazing fire,’ and

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: فَٱعْتَرَفُواْ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ ١١
verses.bangla: they will confess their sins. Away with the inhabitants of the blazing fire!

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ ١٢
verses.bangla: But there is forgiveness and a great reward for those who fear their Lord though they cannot see Him.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓ‌ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ ١٣
verses.bangla: Whether you keep your words secret or state them openly, He knows the contents of every heart.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ ١٤
verses.bangla: How could He who created not know His own creation, when He is the Most Subtle, the All Aware?

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولاً فَٱمْشُواْ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ‌ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ ١٥
verses.bangla: It is He who has made the earth manageable for you––travel its regions; eat His provision- and to Him you will be resurrected.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ ١٦
verses.bangla: Are you sure that He who is in Heaven will not make the earth swallow you up with a violent shudder?

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا‌ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ ١٧
verses.bangla: Are you sure that He who is in Heaven will not send a whirlwind to pelt you with stones? You will come to know what My warning means.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ ١٨
verses.bangla: Those who went before them also disbelieved- how terrible was My condemnation!

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ‌ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ‌ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءِۭ بَصِيرٌ ١٩
verses.bangla: Do they not see the birds above them spreading and closing their wings? It is only the Lord of Mercy who holds them up: He watches over everything.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ‌ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ ٢٠
verses.bangla: What force can help you if the Lord of Mercy does not? The disbelievers are truly deluded.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ‌ۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ ٢١
verses.bangla: Who can provide for you if He withholds His provision? Yet they persist in their insolence and their avoidance of the Truth.

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٲطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ ٢٢
verses.bangla: Who is better guided: someone who falls on his face, or someone who walks steadily on a straight path?

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْــِٔدَةَ‌ۖ قَلِيلاً مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ ٢٣
verses.bangla: Say [Prophet], ‘It is He who brought you into being, He who endowed you with hearing, sight, and understanding- what small thanks you give!’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ ٢٤
verses.bangla: Say, ‘It is He who scattered you throughout the earth, He to whom you will be gathered.’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ ٢٥
verses.bangla: They say, ‘If what you say is true, when will this promise be fulfilled?’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۟ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ ٢٦
verses.bangla: Say, ‘God alone has knowledge of this: my only duty is to give clear warning.’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓــَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ ٢٧
verses.bangla: When they see it close at hand, the disbelievers’ faces will be gloomy, and it will be said, ‘This is what you were calling for.’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ ٢٨
verses.bangla: Say, ‘Just think- regardless of whether God destroys me and my followers or has mercy on us- who will protect the disbelievers from an agonizing torment?’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا‌ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ ٢٩
verses.bangla: Say, ‘He is the Lord of Mercy; we believe in Him; we put our trust in Him. You will come to know in time who is in obvious error.’

verses.arabic_tajweed_html: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينِۭ ٣٠
verses.bangla: Say, ‘Just think: if all your water were to sink deep into the earth who could give you flowing water in its place?’
